control.name: checkBox1
control.description: If checked, the navbar's background is custom painted.

control.name: checkBox2
control.description: If checked, the group captions are custom painted.

control.name: checkBox3
control.description: If checked, the client area of groups is custom painted.

control.name: checkBox4
control.description: If checked, the client area's foreground of groups is custom painted.

control.name: checkBox5
control.description: If checked, the item links are custom painted.

control.name: checkBox6
control.description: If checked, the "Details" group is painted with the custom height.
